example.description: Deletes the Auto Scaling group named 'my-test-asg' if the group has no running instances. You are prompted for confirmation before deletion occurs.
Deletes the Auto Scaling group named 'my-test-asg' if the group has no running instances. You are not prompted for confirmation before deletion occurs.

Deletes the Auto Scaling group named 'my-test-asg', terminating any running instances it contains. You are prompted for confirmation before deletion occurs. The operation does not wait for all instances to terminate before deleting the group.
